sub_title: Business Process Consultant at Fruition Partners | Northern & Central Europe
summary: Victor is a process consultant, driven by work that gives satisfaction, from analyzing and improving business processes to coaching colleagues. He is an enterprising person. He thinks in results and goals. He likes to pioneer, design, develop and structure. He has a proactive working attitude. He is assertive, customer oriented and friendly. He is good at listening and questioning and can empathize with others. He is organized, structured and solution oriented. He is accurate and pays attention to details. Working independently or in a team, he can handle either one. He is resilient and possess a good dose of perseverance. He has a great sense of responsibility and is quality oriented.

location.short: Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland
location.default: Alphen aan den Rijn, South Holland, Netherlands

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description: Fruition Partners, a DXC Technology Company (formerly known as Logicalis SMC) is the dedicated global ServiceNow practice of DXC Technology. DXC Technology (DXC: NYSE) is the world’s leading independent, end-to-end IT services company, helping clients harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. Created by the merger of CSC and the Enterprise Services business of Hewlett Packard Enterprise, DXC Technology serves nearly 6,000 private and public sector clients across 70 countries. The company’s technology independence, global talent and extensive partner network combine to deliver powerful next-generation IT services and solutions. DXC Technology is recognized among the best corporate citizens globally and is a ServiceNow Global Strategic Partner. For more information on Fruition Partners, A DXC Technology Company, visit www.fruitionpartners.nl.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Tata Steel Europe Ltd. was a steelmaking company headquartered in London, United Kingdom, with its main operations in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands. The company was created in 2007, when Tata Group took over the British-Dutch Corus Group. In 2021, the company was split into a British and a Dutch branch.

Victor's general task was to provide process consultancy to further develop the IT Continuity Planning process. Specific tasks of Victor were setting up a maintenance process for the IT Continuity Plan, setting up a test procedure for the IT Continuity Plan, setting up a training process for the IT Continuity Plan and setting up a distribution process for the IT Continuity Plan. Furthermore, Victor himself took the initiative to completely update the process document for IT Service Continuity Management.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Management Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Prosus N.V., or Prosus, is a Dutch multinational conglomerate company that is the international Internet assets division of South African multinational Naspers. The global investment group is the largest consumer Internet company in Europe, and among the largest technology investors in the world.

Victor's general task was to provide process consultancy for the implementation of the Configuration and Change Management processes. Specific tasks of Victor were setting up all services in the new ITSM tool 4me, migrating the Asset registration / CMDB (including that of data centers and their relations) from ServiceNow to 4me and arranging the Asset / Configuration Management in 4me. Furthermore, Victor took the initiative to set up Data Quality Dashboards in 4me for doing DQ Management on the Assets / Cis, both within PayU and Prosus, for which he received the 4me 2021 Innovator Award. In addition, Victor was also asked to design the Change Control (Governance) process based on a template from Quint, to arrange the Asset registration between IT and Finance with those involved and to map and formally set up the IT Asset Management process.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Management Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Prosus N.V., or Prosus, is a Dutch multinational conglomerate company that is the international Internet assets division of South African multinational Naspers. The global investment group is the largest consumer Internet company in Europe, and among the largest technology investors in the world.

During this project Victor was responsible for the implementation / improvement of the Service Management processes Configuration Management and Change Management with the necessary adjustments in ServiceNow. He was responsible for project management and project coordination. He used Agile to implement improvements in the organisation via Sprints and worked closely with Prosus employees for this. He drew up the Sprint Backlog, carried out the refinements of the Stories together with the Tech Lead, he contributed to the development of Stories, he kept all the work of the project team members in order, he maintained the status of the Stories administratively. He performed quality management on the work to be delivered, held weekly separate meetings with all stakeholders and supervised and directed the project team members.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Management Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Nationale Nederlanden is one of the largest insurance and asset management companies in the Netherlands. The first of June in 2017 Nationale Nederlanden acquired its competitor Delta Lloyd. 

The assignment concerned the coordination of all-round operational and tactical Service Management activities  based on ServiceNow application IT Guardian. This includes the processes Incident Management, Problem Management, Change Management, Request Fulfilment, Configuration Management, Service Portfolio Management, Service Level Reporting, and Continuity Management. The responsibilities further include the support of the ServiceNow DevOps team with writing user stories and keeping them up-to-date.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Manager

profile_positions.description:
Royal Dutch Shell plc, commonly known as Shell, is a British-Dutch oil and gas company headquartered in the Netherlands and incorporated in the United Kingdom. It is one of the six oil and gas "supermajors" in the world.

The assignment concerned the automation of Shell reports in ServiceNow resulting in man time effort saving for report creation. This supported the clients tactical objective to move towards proactive incident and problem management. Not only through the work delivered for the automated reporting made available but also by providing the man time bandwidth to be able to focus time and resources to proactive measures and methodologies.

Tasks and responsibilities were those of collecting functional requirements and create reports based on these requirements along with the documentation.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Delta Lloyd Group was a Dutch insurer with operations in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. Next to the insurance operations Delta Lloyd also had asset management and real estate operations and a few minor banks. The company was acquired by NN Group on the first of June in 2017.

The assignment concerned the implementation and coordination of all-round operational and tactical Service Management activities  based on ServiceNow application IT Guardian. This includes the processes Incident Management, Problem Management, Change Management, Request Fulfilment, Configuration Management, Service Portfolio Management, Service Level Reporting, and Continuity Management. The responsibilities further include the support of the ServiceNow DevOps team with writing user stories and keeping them up-to-date.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Manager

profile_positions.description:
ABN AMRO Bank is the third-largest bank in the Netherlands.

The assignment / task was to achieve process improvement of the process around the application portfolio OAR XL in order to improve the data quality around this process and of the CMDB. Specific tasks were to identify the gaps in the OAR process to get a complete process description, a clear RACI and a technical workflow description of the registration of an application in the OAR XL database, and in addition, identify the risks associated with the process.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Management Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Delta Lloyd Group was a Dutch insurer with operations in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. Next to the insurance operations Delta Lloyd also had asset management and real estate operations and a few minor banks. The company was acquired by NN Group on the first of June in 2017.

The assignment / task was to review the IT Service Management (ITIL) processes using a CSI methodology, and bringing out an advice on the steps to take to achieve improvements for these processes.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Management Process Consultant

profile_positions.description: Provide information through phone and selling products and services, give guided tours and advice to potential customers, perform payment operations and book keeping, keeping neat and clean the office and the workplace.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager / Sales Advisor
